Companies data at individual level.

Source: R/data.R
indiv_dt.Rd

Companies data at individual level.

Usage

indiv_dt

Format

A data.table with 9 786 rows and 12 variables:

A10

business sector, not hierarchical

A21

business sector, not hierarchical but nested in A10

A88

business sector, not hierarchical but nested in A21

CJ

legal category, not hierarchical

TYPE

type of distribution, not hierarchical

SIZE

Number of employees (categorical), not hierarchical

NUTS1

NUTS 1 level of European administrative regions, not hierarchical

NUTS2

NUTS 2 level of European administrative regions, not hierarchical

NUTS3

NUTS 3 level of European administrative regions, not hierarchical

WEIGHT

Weight of the companies, numeric

TURNOVER

Turnover, numeric

PRODUCTION

Production, numeric

On this page
